forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Scattered showers and thunderstorms before 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny, with a high near 91. South southwest wind around 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 69, with temperatures rising to around 71 overnight. Southwest wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before 5pm. Partly sunny, with a high near 85. West northwest wind 3 to 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Wednesday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 62. North northeast wind 3 to 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight

Chance of precipitation is 50%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
